gobblin.http

Interface HttpClient<RQ,RP>

  • Type Parameters:
    RQ - type of request
    RP - type of response
    All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApacheHttpAsyncClient, ApacheHttpClient, R2Client, ThrottledHttpClient

    public interface HttpClient<RQ,RP>
extends Closeable
    An interface to send a request
